author: pburba

author: pburba
msg: * subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tree_conflict_tests.py
(merge_replace_causes_tree_conflict2): Restructure test to make it easier
to follow what it does, what it expects, and where those expectations
are not being met.  Put the file-with-file replacement on local delete
that was removed in r1069158, but this time use a shallow merge, rather
than trying to target a deleted file.

author: brandonwilliams

author: trawick
msg: fix theoretical const issue in call to strchr()

author: fdmanana
msg: Merged revision 1070625 from trunk:
_all_docs rows must not deleted include documents
After COUCHDB-1061, when POSTing to _all_docs?include_docs=true with
the body "keys" option, deleted documents were part part of the output.
The "doc" property of each _all_docs row should have the value 'null'
for all deleted documents (when ?include_docs=true).
A test was added to help prevent this from happening again.
